metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12107 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The upnp_event_prepare function in upnpevents.c in MiniUPnP MiniUPnPdthrough 2.1 allows a remote attacker to leak information from the heap dueto improper validation of an snprintf return value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

miniupnpd - 2.1-6ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: miniupnpd package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1-6ubuntu2').
